About Diffusion Transform Parent

Parent project for Diffusion transformers. Structures components of Diffusion Transform. The transformers module supports converting values. The streams module supports combining transformers and Diffusion value streams. The updaters module supports combining transformers and Diffusion updaters. The messaging module supports combining transformers and Diffusion messaging. The aggregate module combines these modules. The examples module provides a collection of examples.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
Transformers Module for transformers. Provides classes for transforming values.
Streams Module for transforming streams. Provides classes for transforming value streams.
Updaters Module for transforming updaters. Provides classes for transforming values supplied to updaters.
Messaging Module for transforming request/response messaging. Provides classes for transforming requests and responses.
Aggregate Module for aggregating other modules. Provides a shaded JAR containing the code relating to transformers, streams, updaters and messaging.
Examples Module for examples of Diffusion transformers.
